summary:
Physician (MD, PhD) with extensive experience in clinical practice and operational and leadership positions in pharmaceutical industry including cross-cultural team management in Europe and Asia. Outstanding interpersonal, motivational and presentation skills. Clear oversight of the organization, committed to cost-effective management of resources and quality performance. Expert in customer oriented pragmatic approaches. Established track records of building and retaining high performance teams by hiring, developing and motivating skilled professionals. High-energy, results-oriented leader with an entrepreneurial attitude.
New Mobile: +31 6 2133 8484
